name: Lustful Pussies
description:
In Lustful Pussies, you play in third person as John, who has fallen asleep and is dreaming. In this dream, he is the hero of a real action movie! He has to take the Dildo Gun and shoot back from the crowds of excited women who want to beat and fuck William.
Lustful Pussies is a third-person shooter where you have to shoot at horny women with a real Dildo Gun. Be especially vigilant! William has only one life. Fuck horny girls with dildos that your Dildo Gun fires. Get unreal pleasure from the gameplay and eye-pleasing graphics!
Game Features:
Fun music and cool atmosphere!
Catchy, intuitive gameplay!
Lots of beautiful naked girls!
Very beautiful graphics!
